official_title: A joint resolution designating the second Sunday in June of each year as "National Pet Remembrance Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the second Sunday in June of each year as "National Pet Remembrance Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution designating the second Sunday in June of each year as "National Pet Remembrance Day".
